title: “Heroes Reborn” (8 p.m., NBC: There’s a familiar face on tonight’s episode
text:
Tweet Published: Thu, October 22, 2015 @ 12:00 a.m. 
“Heroes Reborn” (8 p.m., NBC: There’s a familiar face on tonight’s episode of “Heroes Reborn” as fan favorite Masi Oka returns in the role of Hiro Nakamura. Meanwhile, Noah Bennet (Jack Coleman) takes matters in his own hands to get the answers he seeks. 
“Restaurant Impossible” (9 p.m., Food): Season 12 gets cooking. 
“The Haunting Of ...” (9 p.m., Lifetime Movie Network): Meatloaf. Not sure if this refers to the comfort food or the singer. 
TV listings, B6
